app.name: SmartApply
app.signinUnlock: Sign in to unlock your career potential

home.heroDescription: Transform your job search with AI-powered resume optimization, interview preparation, and personalized application strategies.

features.resumeDescription: Create ATS-optimized resumes tailored to specific job descriptions with AI assistance.
features.interviewDescription: Practice with AI-powered mock interviews and get personalized feedback.
features.matchingDescription: Find the perfect opportunities with intelligent job matching algorithms.

auth.secureOAuth: Secure OAuth 2.0 authentication with LinkedIn & Google

dashboard.title: Choose Your Next Step
dashboard.subtitle: Accelerate your career journey with AI agents

resume.title: AI Resume Generation
resume.description: Instantly craft an ATS-friendly resume and cover letter with an AI agent.

technical.title: Technical Interview Agent
technical.description: Boost your confidence by practicing technical interviews with an AI voice agent.

behavioral.title: Behavioral Interview Agent
behavioral.description: Ace your behavioral interviews by practicing with an AI voice agent.

career.title: AI Career Analysis
career.description: Get personalized career path recommendations with AI-powered insights.

qa.title: Practice Answers Tailored to Your Role
qa.toolbarNote: These Q&A are generated specifically for your scanned role.
qa.empty: No Q&A found from the API.

header.title: Welcome to AI Resume Generation, {name}!
header.subtitle: Upload your documents and let AI transform your job search experience

upload.coverHint: Optional: Enhance your applications with a personalized cover letter.

status.sizeLimit: File size must be less than 10MB
status.coverFail: Cover letter upload failed. Try again.

onboarding.readyBody: You've successfully uploaded your resume. Now let's find the perfect job matches for you!

steps.findBody: Paste job descriptions from LinkedIn, Indeed, or any job board.
steps.analysisBody: We run an ATS-style scan to match requirements with your resume.
steps.resultsBody: Receive a tailored resume and cover letter for each job.
steps.practiceBody: Prepare with Technical or Behavioral questions tailored to the role.

onboarding.ctaTail: (bottom-right) to analyze your first job opportunity.

tips.title: Pro Tips for Best Results
tips.tip1: Copy the complete job description including requirements and responsibilities
tips.tip2: Include company information when available for better personalization
tips.tip3: Try multiple job postings to see how your resume adapts to different roles

badges.noJobsYet: No Jobs Scanned Yet? Start new Job Match now!

upload.limit24h: You can only upload a resume once every 24 hours.
upload.upgradeUnlock: Upgrade to Premium to unlock more frequent uploads.
upload.passed24h: 24 hours have passed since your last upload.
upload.reuploadAllowed: You can re-upload your resume if you like.

billing.portalError: Failed to open billing portal. Please try again.
billing.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
billing.cancelError: Failed to cancel subscription. Please try again.

header.title: Technical Interview Dashboard
header.subtitle: Generate role‑aligned technical questions, review answers, and get interview‑ready fast.

empty.ctaTitle: Please run a Job Scan first
empty.ctaBody: The interview experience is personalized to a specific job. Start by scanning a job to unlock question sets and feedback aligned with that role.

qa.title: Technical Q&A
qa.body: Practice technical interviews tailored to your job scan and seniority.

behavioral.title: Behavioral Scenarios
behavioral.body: Practice STAR-style answers for people, process, and leadership questions.

bank.title: Question Bank + Feedback
bank.body: Get curated prompts and actionable feedback based on your job scan.

modes.title: Practice Modes
modes.body: Answer by typing, or practice verbally with timed responses.

templates.title: Answer Templates
templates.body: Use proven structures (STAR, SOAR) with role-specific examples.

ats.title: ATS & Role Alignment
ats.body: Feedback maps to the skills and keywords found in your job scan.

1.title: 1. Run a Job Scan
1.body: Paste a job description to build a role-specific profile.

2.title: 2. Choose Interview Type
2.body: Practice Technical or Behavioral questions matched to the job.

3.title: 3. Get Feedback
3.body: Receive targeted feedback and iterate to improve quickly.

items.1: Scan the full job description (responsibilities + requirements) for better alignment.
items.2: Try both Technical and Behavioral to cover skills and storytelling.
items.3: Practice out loud and keep responses structured using STAR/SOAR.

final.title: Ready to Get Started?
final.body: Click “Start a Job Scan” to unlock your personalized interview practice.

communication.title: Communication
communication.body: Improve clarity, active listening, and concise delivery.

team.title: Team Player
team.body: Showcase collaboration, conflict resolution, and empathy.

header.description: Start a live simulated interview adapted to this topic. Your camera can be blurred, and you’ll see a live transcript on the right.

transcript.title: Live Transcript
transcript.subtitle: Real-time conversation transcript
transcript.empty: Transcript will appear here once the conversation starts...

errors.missing: Missing name or email. Please complete your profile and try again.
errors.startFail: Failed to start session. Please try again.

cameraErrors.insecureContext: Camera requires HTTPS or localhost. Please use https:// or localhost.
cameraErrors.permissionBlocked: Camera permission is blocked in the browser. Allow camera in Site settings and reload.
cameraErrors.denied: Camera access was denied. Click the camera icon in the address bar to allow and reload.
cameraErrors.busy: Camera is busy (used by another app). Close other apps (Zoom/Teams) and retry.
cameraErrors.notFound: No camera device found. Check Windows Privacy settings > Camera.
cameraErrors.generic: Couldn't start your camera. Check browser permissions and HTTPS.

jobList.title: Your Applications
jobList.empty: No applications in this view yet.

applied.tooltipUnmark: Click to mark as not applied

tooltips.technicalDisabled: First Generate Resume then use this Interview Module

errors.generateQuestions: Error generating questions. Please try again.

status.deleted: Successfully deleted {count, plural, one {1 scan} other {# scans}}
